name: chat2csv
description: Script to convert Roll20 and Discord chat logs to CSV.

scripts.test: eslint src/*.ts src/**/*.ts && npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --recursive test/**/*-spec.ts
scripts.test:collect: npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --recursive test/collect-spec.ts
scripts.test:csv: npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --recursive test/csv-spec.ts
scripts.test:parse: npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --recursive test/parse-spec.ts
scripts.test:multiline: npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --recursive test/multiline-spec.ts
scripts.test:shorten: npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --recursive test/shorten-spec.ts
scripts.test:capitalise: npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --recursive test/capitalise-spec.ts
scripts.test:stop: npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --recursive test/stop-spec.ts
scripts.test:quotes: npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --recursive test/split-quotes-spec.ts
